info.name: Speaking Practice API
info.description: Complete API collection for Speaking Practice API - IELTS Speaking Training Platform

body.raw:
{
  "topicId": "00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000",
  "questionText": "Describe a memorable journey you have taken.",
  "questionType": "Part 2",
  "suggestedStructure": "Introduction, Main story, Conclusion",
  "sampleAnswers": ["Sample answer 1", "Sample answer 2"],
  "keyVocabulary": ["memorable", "journey", "experience"],
  "estimatedBandRequirement": 6.5,
  "timeLimitSeconds": 120
}

{
  "title": "Technology and Innovation",
  "description": "Topics related to technology and innovation",
  "partNumber": 1,
  "difficultyLevel": "intermediate",
  "topicCategory": "Technology",
  "keywords": ["technology", "innovation", "digital"]
}

{
  "word": "sophisticated",
  "phonetic": "/səˈfɪstɪkeɪtɪd/",
  "partOfSpeech": "adjective",
  "definitionEn": "Having a refined knowledge of culture and fashion",
  "definitionVi": "Tinh tế, phức tạp",
  "ieltsBandLevel": 7.0,
  "topicCategories": ["General"],
  "exampleSentences": ["She has a sophisticated taste in art."],
  "synonyms": ["refined", "cultured"],
  "antonyms": ["simple", "naive"],
  "collocations": ["sophisticated approach", "sophisticated technology"]
}

formdata.description: Badge icon image file (max 5MB, formats: JPEG, PNG, GIF, WEBP, SVG)

request.description: Upload a badge icon to MinIO and get the URL (Admin role required). Use this URL when creating or updating achievements.

body.raw:
{
  "title": "First Steps",
  "description": "Complete your first speaking practice session",
  "achievementType": "milestone",
  "requirementCriteria": "{\"type\": \"session_count\", \"target\": 1}",
  "points": 10,
  "badgeIconUrl": "http://localhost:9000/avatars/badges/badge_xxx.png"
}

request.description: Create a new achievement (Admin role required). Upload badge icon first to get the URL.

body.raw:
{
  "title": "First Steps - Updated",
  "description": "Complete your first speaking practice session (updated)",
  "achievementType": "milestone",
  "requirementCriteria": "{\"type\": \"session_count\", \"target\": 1}",
  "points": 15,
  "badgeIconUrl": "http://localhost:9000/avatars/badges/badge_xxx.png",
  "isActive": true
}

request.description: Update an existing achievement (Admin role required)

variable.description: The achievement ID to update badge icon

request.description: Upload and update badge icon for an existing achievement (Admin role required)
